JS/PHP Includes
===============

All plugins used for the various effects and functions that Alaska comprises of, (found in [root]/js), are released under GPL/MIT/Open Source, and are therefore free to use. License headers must be kept in place for the relevant attribution to their respective authors.

Here’s a full list of the plugins used, and url’s of where to download or read documentation.

1. Dynamic Ajax powered Mailchimp forms - https://github.com/scdoshi/jquery-ajaxchimp
2. Social sharing buttons for blog posts - http://sharrre.com
3. Contact & Proposal contact form submissions - http://ReactiveRaven.github.com/jqBootstrapValidation/
4. ’background-size: cover’ support for IE8 - https://github.com/louisremi/background-size-polyfill
